dashboardv3 module¶

dashboardv3.book_engine(book)¶

Grab book and seperate out authors and return book information

Parameters

book – string

Returns

All book information

dashboardv3.display_chart(attr, genere, slider)¶

Accepts country name and returns a figure showing genres distribution for that country.

Parameters

  • attr (String) – Attribute name e.g. Book rates.

  • genere (String) – Selected genre.

  • slider (float) – How many stuff we want to show in the figure

Returns

Figure shows the attributes distribution for selected book genre.

Return type

plotly.graph_objects.Figure

dashboardv3.display_genres_from_country(attr)¶

Accepts country name and returns a figure showing genres distribution for that country.

Parameters

attr (String) – String for the country name.

Returns

Figure shows genres distribution for selected country.

Return type

plotly.graph_objects.Figure

dashboardv3.get_cosine_sim(*strs)¶

Get the cosine similarity between strings

Parameters

strs – strings to be compared

Returns

integer representing the cosine similarity

dashboardv3.get_jaccard_sim(str1, str2)¶

Get the jaccard similarity between strings :param str1: String 1 :param str2: String 2 :return: integer representing jaccard similarity between strings

dashboardv3.get_vectors(*strs)¶

Get the vectors from strings’

Parameters

strs – strings to be vectorized

Returns

array of vectors

dashboardv3.recommend_desc(book)¶

Model to recommend a book based on another book. Model uses book descriptions, authors, and genres to find the book with the closest closest similarity

Parameters

book (String) – String for book to be looked up. Does not have to be exact match.

Returns

[Corrected string of input, Recommended book Title, Recommended Book Description, Recommended Book Rating, Recommended Book Length, Recommended Book Author,Recommended Book URL]

Return type

List

dashboardv3.render_content(tab)¶

This function takes in the name of the tab and generate the content for different tabs.

Parameters

name (str.) – tab.

Returns

list – A list of HTML object.

dashboardv3.update_output1(value)¶

The purpose of this function is to generate the output for the dash tab “Make a Recommendation”. The function takes in the value of the user selected drop down to display the top recommendations.

Parameters

value (str) – User selected book

Returns

Returns values for different book attributes of the top recommended book

Return type

str

dashboardv3.update_output2(value)¶

The purpose of this function is to generate the output for the dash tab “Make a Recommendation”. The function takes in the value of the user selected drop down to display the top recommendations.

Parameters

value (str) – User selected book

Returns

Returns values for different book attributes of the top recommended book

Return type

str

Book-Recommendation
